title: Kcet Procedure
content:
This post contains a detailed explanation of admission through kcet. I will talk mainly about PU Board students and will include extra information for Cbse fellas when needed(idk about icse).
Note that this information is based upon the procedure I followed for the admission in the year 2024.

First round:
After getting seat alloted in PESU (Any campus) through KCET Counselling and opting Choice 1 (refer kea website for in detail information about Choices). 
1. Paying fees to kea: For payment through online, u can use netbanking or other online payment services. 
For payment through offline, download the chalan from the website. Print it and take it to your bank branch. There u have to either pay it through RTGS/NEFT. After finishing the payment the bank will give u two copies, one would be student copy and another would be college copy, retaining the bank copy with themselves. 
I insist on taking the xerox of the copies after the payment. 
After the payment is verified u will get your admission order.
2. Preparing documents: 
Make a set of original copies of the following documents:
   1. 12th Marks Card
   2. 10th Marks Card
   3. Fee receipt provided by the bank
   4. Admission order (preferably a colour      print)
   5. Income caste certificate (if applicable)
   6. 3 Passport size and 3 stamp size photos
Note that these original documents will be taken by the college and will be returned after a year. 
Making photo copies of all your documents is highly recommended, Even for applying for a loan. 
3. Reporting to the college: Congrats 90% of the work is done. Now report to the college before the deadline and go to the main building (Golden jubilee building) after going there, the student has to go alone to a room full of computers and create his own account on his own. (I recommend you to have knowledge about your parent's profession, income, your 10th,12th marks, CET Marks and rank and CET application number. Yes you will be allowed to refer to documents). 
After the registration you are told to go to cet admission counter where u have to submit your original documents and photos. 
After that you will be given an acknowledgement which should be showed to a person providing the joining kit. A TC Requisition letter will be given to you which u have to fill and get it stamped from the person who took your documents. After getting the joining kit, Congratulations you are now a part of PES University. 
(making a few photocopies of the acknowledgement)
After this go to ur PU College and give them the letter with 100 rupees and 12,11 marks card. An acknowledgement will be given. 
Admission through round 2,3 will be very similar. 

Admission into hostel. (Information only for PESU Boys hostel is available) 
This can be done only after you have gotten the acknowledgement of ur admittance. 
Report to the hostel and then write your acknowledgement number, name, phone number. Asking them the prices for the hostel rooms. After this u can go back to your home. And NO the warden doesn't cooperate and will not let u get your admission immediately nor will he tell u the exact date u have to come back. You will later get a phone call from the hostel telling you to report to the hostel on a certain date (this call comes usually after 2 days).

Documents required: (All are photo copies) 
1. Admission acknowledgement. 
2. KCET Fee receipt. 
3. A character certificate from your college with stamp or sign of the principal of the college. It should preferably contain statements like: The student had a good behavior, Was not part of any sort of ragging, etc. Even a Photocopy of your TC works, note that it should have the statements provided above. 
4. Affidavits, 2 to be exact. Bonds worth rupees 20 or more are to be taken and the matter provided by the hostel should be printed on it. 
In the first affidavit the Student will be the first party. 
And in the second affidavit the parent will be the first party. 
PESU Boys Hostel will be the second party in both the affidavits. (original copies of these affidavits must be submitted to the hostel) 


Reporting to the Hostel for orientation:
Report on the day of orientation (they will tell u to come at 7:30 in the morn but u can come till 10) After reporting you will have to register with your name, father's name and LG'S name (if u are not from bangalore) 
After this you will be given a token and told to go to an auditorium where an uncle will come and tell you things which your parents have been telling you for your whole life in 2.5 hours. 
After the orientation you will be given an application form for rupees 100. Fill this form and take a payment details slip from the hostel staff and fill the information in that. 
(U have two options, payment through dd or payment through rtgs/neft) 
Make a bunch of the documents mentioned above, application form and payment slip. And give it to the person who is incharge of documents collection. 
After submitting this u are officially part of PESU Boys hostel. 
An acknowledgement will be given and further details will be given to you. 

If theres any misinformation or anything to be added/corrected, feel free to reach out.
Hope this helps! 
(My English is not so very good so thank you for baring with it).
